custom_css: .image-banner { min-height: 90vh; position: relative; overflow: hidden; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f8fafc 0%, #e2e8f0 100%); display: flex; align-items: center; }

.image-banner::before { content: ''; position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0; background: radial-gradient(circle at 30% 20%, rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.15) 0%, transparent 50%), radial-gradient(circle at 80% 80%, rgba(6, 182, 212, 0.1) 0%, transparent 50%); z-index: 1; }
.banner__content { position: relative; z-index: 2; text-align: center; max-width: 1000px; margin: 0 auto; padding: var(--space-8); }

.banner__heading { font-family: var(--font-display); font-size: clamp(3.5rem, 8vw, 7rem); font-weight: 700; line-height: 1.05; letter-spacing: -0.03em; color: var(--color-gray-900); margin-bottom: var(--space-6); background: linear-gradient(135deg, #1e293b 0%, #475569 100%); -webkit-background-clip: text; -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent; }

.banner__text { font-size: clamp(1.25rem, 2vw, 1.5rem); line-height: 1.6; color: var(--color-gray-600); margin-bottom: var(--space-10); max-width: 700px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; font-weight: 400; }
.banner__buttons { display: flex; gap: var(--space-6); justify-content: center; flex-wrap: wrap; }

.banner__buttons .button { font-family: var(--font-primary); font-weight: 600; border-radius: var(--radius-xl); transition: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1); min-height: 60px; padding: var(--space-5) var(--space-10); font-size: 1.125rem; text-transform: none; }
.banner__buttons .button--primary { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #1e40af 0%, #3b82f6 50%, #06b6d4 100%); border: none; color: white; box-shadow: 0 10px 25px -5px rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.4); }
.banner__buttons .button--secondary { background: var(--color-white); color: var(--color-gray-800); border: 2px solid var(--color-gray-300); box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm); }
.banner__buttons .button--secondary:hover { background: var(--color-gray-50); border-color: var(--color-gray-400); transform: translateY(-1px); box-shadow: var(--shadow-md); }
@media (max-width: 768px) { .banner__buttons { flex-direction: column; align-items: center; gap: var(--space-4); } .banner__buttons .button { width: 100%; max-width: 300px; } }
